      • move

        public static boolean move(java.lang.String input,
                           GameBoard gb)
        Method that accepts a move from user and tries to execute said move if move is valid
        Parameters:
        input - - Accepts users input which should be a chess move e.g. "h2 h4"
        gb - - Accepts current state of chess board
        Returns:
        true if move is successful, false if not

      • isChessMove

        public static boolean isChessMove(java.lang.String chessMove)
        Method that checks in initial input from user e.g. "a2 a4" or if the user is offering to draw
        Parameters:
        chessMove - - chess move input from user. Correct format: "{a-h}{1-8} {a-h}{1-8} {Promotion Piece or draw?}"
        Returns:
        true if in correct format, false if in incorrect format
